$$
log(E(\mu|\lambda)) = \alpha + x' \beta
$$
$$
Exp(log(E\mu|\lambda)) = Exp(\alpha+x' \beta) = E(\mu|\lambda) = e^{\alpha} + e^{x'\beta}
$$

$$
log(E(\mu|\lambda)) = log(exposure) +\alpha + x' \beta
$$

$$
log(\dfrac{E(\mu|\lambda)}{exposure}) = \alpha + x'\beta
$$
